1: I like the daily breakfasts and the access to a happy hour is nice to come back to when you need to refresh at the hotel
The hotel is updated in the lobby and eating area with the nice smaller rooms The concierge staff was more than helpful
The facility is newly renovated in the last 5 years so it is still very clean
An All New and Bright Renovation
All staff were hard at work like the front desk who ensures that all guests are comfortable at their stay and wait during which time their elevator was on scheduled maintenance for an upgrade
Great location room was updated and the bed was comfortable even had a small kitchen which was a nice surprise
Looks refurbished with updated decor Friendly staff decent breakfast and free evening social
